data.text: @Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Still pushing the vaccines for children when it has been publicly put out that it only has a 12% effectiveness? Did you all not read the Pfizer documents?
@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Your still recommending people jab their children after 9 pages of adverse reactions and deaths released from phyzer, you are disgusting and murderers

@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo News announcement from a major network NBC regarding vaccines for this age group. Please read if you care for your child.
https://t.co/v2FL9BsjqF

@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Can you explain what benefit would accrue to a 5 year old from this “vaccine”?
They’re not at risk.
Everyone else who gets jabbed can still  contract and transmit. 
There is no way to quantify “it reduces symptoms”
EXPLAIN.
@Ptbohealth @PtboCounty @CityPtbo Please be informed that the FDA was court ordered to start releasing data! Please inform yourself https://t.co/GhSBSNBGyJ
